mapper.select: select s.*, d1.dictname busstypedesc, d2.dictname shopstsdesc, d.depname, e.empname from fims_shop s left join comm_dict d1 on s.busstype=d1.dictid and d1.dicttypeid='fims_busstype' left join comm_dict d2 on s.shopsts=d2.dictid and d2.dicttypeid='fims_shopsts' left join org_department d on s.departmentid = d.id left join org_employee e on s.employeeid = e.id where s.delflag='0' limit ${(page-1)*limit},${limit}
select count(1) from fims_shop where delflag='0'
mapper.insert: insert into fims_shop (shopno, shname, shortname, buslicence, ownername, telephone, owneridnum, accountname, account, busstype, province, city, country, address, longitude, latitude, qrcode, shopsts, departmentid, employeeid, remark, createtime, modifytime, creator, modifier, delflag) values (#{shopno}, #{shname}, #{shortname}, #{buslicence}, #{ownername}, #{telephone}, #{owneridnum}, #{accountname}, #{account}, #{busstype}, #{province}, #{city}, #{country},#{address}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{qrcode}, #{shopsts}, #{departmentid}, #{employeeid}, #{remark}, #{createtime}, #{modifytime}, #{creator}, #{modifier}, #{delflag})
